greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least k such that decimal representation of k*n contains only digits 0 and 2.
link: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a(n) = my(k=1); while(!isok(k*n), k++); k; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 25 2016
while set(str(k*n)) - set('02') != set(): k = max(k+1, next02(k*n)//n)
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 51)]) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Feb 01 2021
results.author: _Ray Chandler_, Jul 12 2004
